          <title>
            <string language="en">Where does water go when it rains?</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Wohin geht Wasser, wenn es regnet?</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Où l'eau disparaît quand il pleut ?</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Aonde a água vai quando chove?</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Dove l'acqua va quando piove?</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Πού το ύδωρ πηγαίνει όταν βρέχει;</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">¿Adónde el agua va cuando llueve?</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">Linking questions of water resources, land use and our environment.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Science and Technology</string>
          </keyword>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Bindung von von Fragen der Wasserbetriebsmittel, der

          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Conexión de cuestiones de los recursos de agua, de la 
utilización del suelo y de nuestro ambiente.</string>
